text: taaki ham (phir) galla lae aur ham usakee pooree hiphaazat karegen yaaqoob ne kaha mai usake baare mein tumhaara aitabaar nahin karata magar vaisa hee jaisa ki usase pahale usake maanjae (bhaee) ke baare mein kiya tha to khud usaka sabase behatar hiphaazat karane vaala hai aur vahee sab se jyaada raham karane vaala hai
